title: It's a (Crypto) Ponzi Scheme!
itunes:title: It's a (Crypto) Ponzi Scheme!
description:
The Ponzi scheme is an old trick, but it's being used in new ways. Learn how this well worn scam is being tailored for the age of cryptocurrency, and the red flags you should be on the lookout for.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
